ContentSection.Title: Article vs. Content section - Comparison of the output

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
The Article element can be displayed very similar to the Content Section. Depending on the formatter and element settings chosen, there should be no visible difference in the generated output.

This page shows a comparison of the output in where the content of the Article and the Content section is almost identical. The Article formatter used is always the Elaborate article teaser.
